messages.message1: So I got a new Tesla Model X, it drives itself!
Man, me and my wife had a fight yesterday.
messages.message3: You see, I wanted to watch the game but she wanted to watch a movie
messages.message4: So, how was the movie then?

messages.message1: Hi Jude, How are you mate?
messages.message2: I’m good and happy to hear from you after a long time.
messages.message3: Yes Jude, I’m little busy here. Anyway, I called you because wanna congratulate you.
messages.message4: Thank you very much. It’s so nice.
messages.message5: Today is one of the happiest days in your life. So enjoy the day.
messages.message6: But my marriage is fixed for tomorrow
messages.message7: That’s why I said, today is one of your happiest days
